thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Notorious Pictures FY Prelim. EBITDA Down At EUR 6.1 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Notorious Pictures FY Prelim. EBITDA Down At EUR 6.1 Mln
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - NOTORIOUS PICTURES SPA:
* FY PRELIM REVENUES: EUR 18.2 MILLION (EUR 23.0 MILLION AT 31 DECEMBER 2016)
* FY PRELIM EBITDA: EUR 6.1 MILLION (EUR 6.6 MILLION AT 31 DECEMBER 2016)
* TREND IN PRELIM FY REVENUES IS IN LINE WITH TREND OF 2017 FILM MARKET
* TREND OF 2017 FILM MARKET SAW GENERAL DROP IN BOX OFFICE * TWO FILMS SCHEDULED FOR Q4 2017 WERE POSTPONED DUE TO DEVELOPMENTS RELATED TO HARVEY WEINSTEIN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
